text: Night bus may refer to: * The Night Bus, a 2007 Iranian film directed by Kiumars Pourahmad * Night Bus, a 2007 Italian noir-comedy film directed by Davide Marengo * Night Bus (2017 film), an Indonesian thriller film * The Knight Bus, a magical vehicle in the Harry Potter series * Night service (public transport), also called night bus, owl service * Night bus lines in Israel * Night buses in London * All Nighter (bus service), night bus service network in San Francisco Bay Area, California * NightRide, network of night bus services in Sydney, Australia
title: Night bus (disambiguation)
